attributes.action: placing a crossing at the cross roads at the bottom of sevenoaks high street, kent.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: at the bottom of sevenoaks high street there is a cross roads where you can turn to go to the lesuire center. currently there is no form of a crossing for pedestrians here and therefore it is very dangerous. i would like one put in place so it is safer for pedestrians.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Sevenoaks Distict Council.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
